import{useEffect}from'react';/* ------------------------------------------------------
 *  Author: Adam Sarty
 *  Student ID: B00794681
 *  T4 - CSCI4177
 * ------------------------------------------------------
 *  Custom hook for managing content loading effects.
 */export const useContentLoader=()=>{useEffect(()=>{// Adds 'loaded' class to '.content' after a delay for visual effect
const timer=setTimeout(()=>{document.querySelector(".content").classList.add("loaded");},50);// Removes 'loaded' class before page unload for cleanup
const beforeUnloadHandler=()=>{document.querySelector(".content").classList.remove("loaded");};// Attach event listener for page unload
window.addEventListener("beforeunload",beforeUnloadHandler);// Cleanup by removing event listener and clearing timeout
return()=>{clearTimeout(timer);window.removeEventListener("beforeunload",beforeUnloadHandler);};},[]);// Effect runs only once on mount
};
